MemeDef.label: futa supremacy
MemeDef.description: Futanari are the superior gender and should rule.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->futa
memeGod->Mother
memeLeaderNoun->queen
memeLeaderAdjective->alpha
memeMoralist->futa believer
creation(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->While [deity0_name] gave strength to men, and beauty woman, [deity0_name] had both. A rare few were given both and blessed in her image.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->[deity0_name] said to all, "Those of you made in my image shall rule upon the rest, as superiors in nature."
intro(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found the image of [deity0_name] and awed them.

conflict(uses=1,tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->A craven [foeLeader] envied the strength of the futanari, and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] created lies and tarnished the image. Branding [deity0_name]'s blessed as freaks."
founderJoin(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->[founderName] knew of their superiority, and made it their mission to improve the tarnished image of the futanari.
victory(uses=1,tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->[founderName]'s power was so awe inspiring, that people began to once again acknowledged the truth, that the futanari were above all other human forms."

setup(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->In a world of weak, simpering men and feeble woman, [founderName] was born blessed by [deity0_name]. [founderName] knew they were special, and sought the power and influence that was their birthright.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->The non believers wheedled and whined, so [founderName] dominated them and forced them to submit.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->Men are feeble and woman craven. It is up to the futanari among us to guide them on the right path
lesson(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->futanari are the only ones with the wisdom and strength to rule
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->A man tried to argue with a futa. Can you believe it? He was swiftly emasculated and shown his proper place.
archistBasis(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->Humanity is the father of the archotechs, but the strength of the futanari exceeds that of the father.
archistFact(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->The archotechs are paternal, maternal, and protect humanity, although non futnaris do not understand how they achieved both.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will finally unlock the strength of men and beauty of woman, ascending all to the perfect forms.
animistFact(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->The most powerful spirits are those of futa, and spirits of futa will be restless unless futa rule.

animistProphecy(tag=meme_FutaSupremacy) ->[itIsSaid] that a powerful spirit of destruction will seek to end the universe, but that a futa will wield the spirit of the [relic0_name] and destroy the destroyer.
